lead_paragraph: People along the rivers and beaches near the Korean border were confronted by a deadly surprise  as dozens of mines from the North washed up in flooding.
snippet: People along the rivers and beaches near the Korean border were confronted by a deadly surprise  as dozens of mines from the North washed up in flooding.

headline.main: In Koreas, Floods Carry Land Mines
headline.print_headline: In Koreas, Floods Send Land Mines To the South
